[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” banner=”true” particles=”true” el_class=”banner-salvia section-bg-salvia”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”res-m-bttm-lg text-center text-lg-left”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]

Firulais Finance $FIRU is a P2P Decentralized CryptoCurrency With Auto Rewards Farming (ARF).

Hold FIRU in your Wallet, and get earnings for each transactions.

Join our community
  • telegram Telegram
  • facebook
  • twitter

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0″ time=”1.6″][vc_single_image image=”1244″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-alt nopb”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Features

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”res-m-bttm-lg” time=”0.3″][vc_single_image image=”988″ img_size=”90×90″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1622405576925{margin-bottom: 28px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Community

Firulais Finance our goal is our community this token is for the people, that people that have dream and want to get success in life, our success is our community success, we will gonna grow up together.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”res-m-bttm-lg” time=”0.4″][vc_single_image image=”992″ img_size=”90×90″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1536822692817{margin-bottom: 28px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Secure And Safe

Firulais is Audited by TechRate
50% Total Token Supply Locked on Unicrypt, Liquidity Pool Locked
No-Owner Smart Contract[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-sm-offset-3″ time=”0.5″][vc_single_image image=”1119″ img_size=”90×90″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1622404800571{margin-bottom: 28px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

DeFI Auto Rewards Farming

Firu is a DeFi Token. Each transaction redistribute 2% of each transaction to all holders.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”tokens” el_class=”section-pad section-bg-salvia bg-fixed-pattern nopb text-center overflow-alt-s”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″][vc_column_text]

Tokenomics

Liquidity Pool 75% Locked Liquidity

MoonMap

Firulais MoonMap is a planned where we take on the most complex problems and turn them into great solutions.!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column animate=”fadeInUp” time=”0.3″]

Phase 1

WebSite Lauch | Begin Token ILO Pre-Sales | Marketing Campaign | ILO Pre-Sales Ending | UniSwap Listing Locked Liquidity |

Phase 2

WebSite Redesign | New WebSite Launch | CoinGecko Listing | CoinMarketCap Listing | Audit Smart Contract |

Phase 3

FIRUDEX | FIRUWALLET | CEX Listing | INFLUENCER PARTNERSHIP | EXPAND MARKETING

Phase 4

FIRU WALLET TOKEN DEPLOY ($FIWT) | $FIWT AIRDROP - $FIRU HOLDERS | $FIWT UNISWAP LISTING | FIRUDEX (SWAP) V2 | FIRU NFT MARKETPLACE | FIRU STAKING | $FIWT CEX LISTING |

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”team” el_class=”section-pad section-bg section-fix-lg”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Team

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”faqs” el_class=”section-pad section-bg-alt”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text]

FAQs

Frequently asked questions (FAQ) or Questions and Answers (Q&A), are listed questions and answers, all supposed to be commonly asked in some context

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-7″ time=”0.3″]

What is Firulais $FIRU

Firulais Finance $FIRU is a P2P Decentralized CryptoCurrency With Auto Rewards Farming (ARF).

In etherscan we see the top wallet with a total supply greater than 50% of $ FIRU tokens, who is it?

As we mentioned from the beginning, the Firulais team does not have tokens, that record corresponds to the blocking of 50% of the total supply that we block in unicrypt, those tokens are blocked and are unreachable, after unlocking they will be burned, in this link you can see more information. https://app.unicrypt.network/amm/uni-v2/token/0xE276056f924E15BEac26F7b10B6D2805F9c64Bb5

I Bought Some $FIRU But Doesn't Appers In My Wallet

Be sure to add the token to your wallet we support any ERC20 wallet, you can add the token with the smartcontract : 0xe276056f924e15beac26f7b10b6d2805f9c64bb5

Is $FIRU on BSC Binance Smart Chain | PancakeSwap

No, FIRU is not on BSC. Be careful of counterfeits and clones. As well we wont list $FIRU on PancakeSwap.

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
